creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: lacquered gourd with organic and geometric designs suspended to lacquered plaque with wire; two bent wooden "arms" on sides of gourd; golden tuft emerging from top of gourd, ending in two spirals; golden persimmon (?) attached to bottom of gourd; black lacquered plaque with golden center; rounded at top with two horizontal spikes on either side, ending in narrow "tail"
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, silver, gold, mother-of-pearl, gourd, wood, nuts etc.
title: A Magician of the Forest
